trial_type.Descripton: An imagined emotion processing task, alternating between blocks of counting backwards and emotional memory recollection. Participant recalls an emotional memory involving a person or people until the end of the task block is reached.

Levels.MentalFingerTapping: A '>' sign is displayed in white in the middle of the screen with a black background.
Levels.Count: A '+' sign is displayed in white in the middle of the screen with a black background.
